abs_function_module¶

abs_function_module.wavelength_to_velocity()¶

Reads in a list of wavelength values to be converted to velocity.

Parameters

  • kind (list[int]) – redshift

  • kind – wavelength

Returns

velocity

Return type

array[int]

abs_function_module.smooth()¶

Smooths out values entered. :param kind: smooth_this :type kind: list[int] :param kind: box_size :type kind: int :returns: now_smooth :rtype: list[int]
